citeinfo.title: Projected wetland densities in the Prairie Pothole Region under climate and land use change scenarios
Projected wetland densities under climate change: habitat loss but little geographic shift in conservation strategy

descript.abstract: Projected wetland densities under 10 different climate models and 3 land use and land cover scenarios. This file contains projected wetland densities under each combination of land use and climate.
descript.purpose: These projections were developed to assess the potential for trade-offs between current and future habitat availability for wetland-dependent species.

idinfo.accconst: None. Please see 'Distribution Info' for details.
idinfo.useconst: None. Users are advised to read the data set's metadata thoroughly to understand appropriate use and data limitations.
idinfo.datacred: Funding for this work was provided by the North Central Climate Science Center (G13AC00390 and G12AC20504).
idinfo.native: Environment as of Metadata Creation: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.3.1 (Build 4959) Service Pack N/A (Build N/A)

attracc.attraccr: No formal attribute accuracy tests were conducted.

dataqual.logic: No formal logical accuracy tests were conducted.
dataqual.complete: Data set is considered complete for the information presented, as described in the abstract. Users are advised to read the rest of the metadata record carefully for additional details.

horizpa.horizpar: A formal accuracy assessment of the horizontal positional information in the data set has not been conducted.

vertacc.vertaccr: A formal accuracy assessment of the vertical positional information in the data set has either not been conducted, or is not applicable.

procstep.procdesc: These projections were developed based on the other data files associated with this journal article. Projections are from predictions of a random forest ensemble based on GCM hindcast and forecast conditions and each land use and land cover scenario.

enttyp.enttypd: Table containing attribute information associated with the data set.

attrdomv.udom: This column added by default by write.csv in R
Concatenation of Statrum, Transect, and Segment in USFWS Waterfowl Breeding Population and Habitat Survey (Traditional Strata only)

attr.attrdef: Longitude in WGS84 corresponding to the center of the closest climate grid cell
Latitude in WGS84 corresponding to the center of the closest climate grid cell

Longitude of center of survey segment. proj4string for Albers coordinate system: "+proj=aea +lat_1=20 +lat_2=60 +lat_0=40 +lon_0=-96 +x_0=0 +y_0=0 +datum=NAD83 +units=m +no_defs +ellps=GRS80 +towgs84=0,0,0"

Latitude of center of survey segment. proj4string for Albers coordinate system: "+proj=aea +lat_1=20 +lat_2=60 +lat_0=40 +lon_0=-96 +x_0=0 +y_0=0 +datum=NAD83 +units=m +no_defs +ellps=GRS80 +towgs84=0,0,0"

attrdomv.udom: Name of each of the 10 climate models used to develop wetland projections under climate change.

attr.attrdef: Projected wetland densities assuming historical patterns of land use and GCM hindcast climate conditions
Projected wetland densities assuming historical patterns of land use and GCM forecast climate conditions
Projected climate impact, calculated as: HistAgGCMForecast/HistAgGCMHindcast

Projected wetland densities assuming uniform patterns of land use and GCM hindcast climate conditions. Under the uniform scenario, the entire landscape was assumed to have the mean number of wetland basins and mean proportion of land in row crops.

Projected wetland densities assuming uniform patterns of land use and GCM forecast climate conditions. Under the uniform scenario, the entire landscape was assumed to have the mean number of wetland basins and mean proportion of land in row crops.
Projected climate impact, calculated as: UniformAgGCMForecast/UniformAgGCMHindcast
Projected wetland densities assuming projected patterns of land use and GCM hindcast climate conditions. Projected land use was based on modeled effects of climate on land use change.
Projected wetland densities assuming projected patterns of land use and GCM forecast climate conditions. Projected land use was based on modeled effects of climate on land use change.
Projected climate impact, calculated as: ProjAgGCMForecast/ProjAgGCMHindcast

overview.eaover: The entity and attribute information provided here describes the tabular data associated with the data set. Please review the detailed descriptions that are provided (the individual attribute descriptions) for information on the values that appear as fields/table entries of the data set.
overview.eadetcit: The entity and attribute information was generated by the individual and/or agency identified as the originator of the data set. Please review the rest of the metadata record for additional details and information.
